profit_mechanisms.name: Variance Risk Premium (VRP)
profit_mechanisms.description: Profit from the difference between realized and implied volatility. Market participants overpay for volatility protection, creating systematic profit opportunities for volatility sellers.

profit_mechanisms.name: Momentum Drift
profit_mechanisms.description: Capture systematic price trends driven by behavioral factors, technical momentum, and trend-following strategies. Exploit persistent directional movements in asset prices.

profit_mechanisms.name: Mean Reversion
profit_mechanisms.description: Exploit temporary price dislocations by betting on return to long-term average prices. Ideal for range-bound markets where prices oscillate within statistical bands.

profit_mechanisms.name: Earnings Volatility
profit_mechanisms.description: Profit from the volatility expansion around earnings announcements and earnings-driven moves. Exploit mispricings in implied volatility relative to realized volatility post-earnings.
